6 namespace voxblox {
7 namespace utils {
8 
9 template <>
10 VoxelEvaluationResult computeVoxelError(
11  const TsdfVoxel& voxel_gt, const TsdfVoxel& voxel_test,
12  const VoxelEvaluationMode evaluation_mode, FloatingPoint* error) {
13  CHECK_NOTNULL(error);
14  *error = 0.0;
15 
16  // Ignore voxels that are not observed in both layers.
17  if (!isObservedVoxel(voxel_gt) || !isObservedVoxel(voxel_test)) {
18  return VoxelEvaluationResult::kNoOverlap;
19  }
20 
21  const bool ignore_behind_test_surface =
22  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindTestSurface) ||
23  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindAllSurfaces);
24 
25  const bool ignore_behind_gt_surface =
26  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindGtSurface) ||
27  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindAllSurfaces);
28 
29  if ((ignore_behind_test_surface && voxel_test.distance < 0.0) ||
30  (ignore_behind_gt_surface && voxel_gt.distance < 0.0)) {
31  return VoxelEvaluationResult::kIgnored;
32  }
33 
34  *error = voxel_test.distance - voxel_gt.distance;
35 
36  return VoxelEvaluationResult::kEvaluated;
37 }
38 
39 template <>
40 VoxelEvaluationResult computeVoxelError(
41  const EsdfVoxel& voxel_gt, const EsdfVoxel& voxel_test,
42  const VoxelEvaluationMode evaluation_mode, FloatingPoint* error) {
43  CHECK_NOTNULL(error);
44  *error = 0.0;
45 
46  // Ignore voxels that are not observed in both layers.
47  if (!isObservedVoxel(voxel_gt) || !isObservedVoxel(voxel_test)) {
48  return VoxelEvaluationResult::kNoOverlap;
49  }
50 
51  const bool ignore_behind_test_surface =
52  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindTestSurface) ||
53  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindAllSurfaces);
54 
55  const bool ignore_behind_gt_surface =
56  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindGtSurface) ||
57  (evaluation_mode == VoxelEvaluationMode::kIgnoreErrorBehindAllSurfaces);
58 
59  if ((ignore_behind_test_surface && voxel_test.distance < 0.0) ||
60  (ignore_behind_gt_surface && voxel_gt.distance < 0.0)) {
61  return VoxelEvaluationResult::kIgnored;
62  }
63 
64  *error = voxel_test.distance - voxel_gt.distance;
65 
66  return VoxelEvaluationResult::kEvaluated;
67 }
68 
69 template <>
70 bool isObservedVoxel(const TsdfVoxel& voxel) {
71  return voxel.weight > 1e-6;
72 }
73 
74 template <>
75 bool isObservedVoxel(const EsdfVoxel& voxel) {
76  return voxel.observed;
77 }
78 
79 template <>
80 FloatingPoint getVoxelSdf(const TsdfVoxel& voxel) {
81  return voxel.distance;
82 }
83 
84 template <>
85 FloatingPoint getVoxelSdf(const EsdfVoxel& voxel) {
86  return voxel.distance;
87 }

89 template <>
90 void setVoxelSdf(const FloatingPoint sdf, TsdfVoxel* voxel) {
91  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
92  voxel->distance = sdf;
93 }
94 
95 template <>
96 void setVoxelSdf(const FloatingPoint sdf, EsdfVoxel* voxel) {
97  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
98  voxel->distance = sdf;
99 }

101 template <>
102 void setVoxelWeight(const FloatingPoint weight, TsdfVoxel* voxel) {
103  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
104  voxel->weight = weight;
105 }
106 
107 template <>
108 void setVoxelWeight(const FloatingPoint weight, EsdfVoxel* voxel) {
109  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
110  voxel->observed = weight > 0.;
111 }
